    Class Description
    Board  
    BoardDesign  
    CheckersClient
    A bridge for communication between the server and the instantiated player or observer NO game functionality should take place within this class.
    CheckersObserver  
    CheckersPlayer
    This is the class that houses the game of checkers.
    CheckersServer  
    GameDesign
    This class is used to indicate the properties (rules) of the game being played
    GameInfo
    The representation of the game in its entirety
    Gui
    A class that only displays information Absolutely no calculations or transformations of ANY objects should occur in here.
